Description: Bimanual 7-DoF (+1 DoF gripper) arm with direct (leader-follower) or VR teleoperation
Details:
- Open source arm allows multiple vendors for increased supply chain stability
- Very smooth implementation of leader-follower teleop
- 7-DoF arm increases overall ease-of-operation

- Turnkey system with mobile base at good prices
- Highly available (ships immediately as of 11/14/25!)

- Configurable in a variety of trims (single, bimanual, leader-follower)
- Good global availability

- Configurable in a variety of trims (single, bimanual, leader-follower) 
- Already in use by some large US labs
